name: TriJam #87: Keep Drifting
description:
Controls: any key to start, then < and > to ski down ahead of the snow that KEEPs DRIFTING down the mountain after you.

Dev. was completed with 20 secs. to spare.  Whew !

Left to do:

1. remove all trees on reset.  Refresh the browser to clear old trees.

2. Better particles for snow and player skis.

3. Music.

4. Gag at the end - after you "win" your player raises his arms in victory and then a bus rides him over.  I know a bit morbid.
